description: Amid system chaos after Halden's death, Oksana Lintz chooses to quarantine the BCI labor assignment flaw, prioritizing data security over immediate system stability.
After Oksana’s intervention, hidden BCI protocols are isolated, disabling automated job and service assignments across Stenograd. Manual overrides are not in place, causing task mismatches.
Major sectors experience abrupt labor reassignment, sending high-score citizens to basic tasks while flagged individuals move into sensitive positions. Confusion disrupts critical city operations.
Citywide frustration intensifies as residents find themselves in unfamiliar roles. Protests and disruptions erupt, with people demanding restoration of their previous assignments.

The Council blames internal factions for the crisis. Security officials push for emergency measures, while Innovators demand a full algorithmic review. Harmonists lose ground as public trust in BCI plummets.
